name: NSClassDescription
desc: An abstract class that provides the interface for querying the relationships and properties of a class.

items.name: init?(for: AnyClass)
items.desc: Returns the class description for a given class.

items.name: class func invalidateClassDescriptionCache()
items.desc: Removes all NSClassDescription objects from the cache.

items.name: class func register(NSClassDescription, for: AnyClass)
items.desc: Registers an NSClassDescription object for a given class in the NSClassDescription cache.

items.name: var attributeKeys: [String]
items.desc: Overridden by subclasses to return the names of attributes of instances of the described class.

items.name: func inverse(forRelationshipKey: String) -> String?
items.desc: Overridden by subclasses to return the name of the inverse relationship from a relationship specified by a given key.

items.name: var toManyRelationshipKeys: [String]
items.desc: Overridden by subclasses to return the keys for the to-many relationship properties of instances of the described class.

items.name: var toOneRelationshipKeys: [String]
items.desc: Overridden by subclasses to return the keys for the to-one relationship properties of instances of the described class.

items.name: static let NSClassDescriptionNeededForClass: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted by init(for:) when a class description cannot be found for a class.
